headline: Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon on the stock market chaos: 'Things will settle down'
summary: Amid market swings and trade war chaos, at least one top executive sees a light at the end of the tunnel. Goldman Sachs (GS) CEO David Solomon said Tuesday that “things will settle down” after all the disorder, despite slow activity in mergers and IPOs.

summary: (Bloomberg) -- Goldman Sachs Group Inc. headline: Goldman Sachs Says Oil Demand Looks Resilient -- OPIS
summary: Analysts at Goldman Sachs said they see oil demand as resilient for now in a report for clients Tuesday morning. Based on Goldman's global tracking, oil demand is on par with where it was a year...
